definition: (to be done) by (a certain date)/lasting (a certain time)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: See it when I was in a two day off-site meeting for the team.
sentences.chinese: 我在一个为期两天小组会议的场外看到的风景。

sentences.english: The government already has started planning a three-year rebuilding effort for the areas damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 政府已开始针对地震灾区制定为期三年的重建计划。

sentences.english: I propose a sole agency aGREement for bicycles for a period of 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 我建议订专销自行车的为期三年的独家代理协议。

sentences.english: Warsaw was the final stop in Mr. Obama's 6 days' six-day trip to Europe.
sentences.chinese: 华沙是奥巴马先生为期六天的欧洲之行的最后一天。

sentences.english: The contract includes a three-year base period followed by one two-year option.
sentences.chinese: 该合同包括为期三年的基本期和两年的选项期。

sentences.english: The Railway Ministry has also ordered a two-month safety review of railway operations.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部长也已经下令将开展为期两个月的安全检查。

sentences.english: Krista receives a heart test during a two-week trip to Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 克丽斯塔在温哥华接受为期两周的心脏检查。

sentences.english: At present, a radiology training program lasts five years.
sentences.chinese: 目前，放射学培训计划为期五年。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister is on a three-day state visit to the US.
sentences.chinese: 目前，莫迪总理正在对美国进行为期三天的国事访问。

sentences.english: Daguerre partnered with Niépce two years later, beginning a four-year cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 两年后，达盖尔和尼埃普斯合作，为期四年。

sentences.english: A nine-week course at Singularity University will cost $25,000.
sentences.chinese: 奇点大学为期九周的课程将花费25000美金。

sentences.english: This parliament selects two of its members to serve as Regents for periods of six months. These regents are known as the Capitani Reggenti, or Ruling Captains.
sentences.chinese: 大议会选举出两名成员担任为期六个月的执政官。

sentences.english: You only pass by on village on the entire weeklong trip.
sentences.chinese: 为期一整个礼拜的旅程中，你只会经过一个村庄。

sentences.english: Teachers and students alike will hxdye a 3-week holiday.
sentences.chinese: 老师和学生一样将有为期三周的假期。

sentences.english: A 10-day display and sales exhibition of goods for children opened yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 为期10天的儿童用品展销会于昨天开始。

sentences.english: The President has called for a 90-day review.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统已经提出进行为期90天的审查。

definition: solstice/the winter solstice 冬至 and summer solstice 夏至
to extend as long as/to lengthen out to
(fig.) to raise the curtain/to lift the curtain/to be a curtain raiser for
to agree to and sign (a treaty etc)
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
